item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 6, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: CodeTracer – A new time-traveling debugger implemented in Nim and Rust (34 points | 3 comments)
2. Age and cognitive skills: Use it or lose it (205 points | 97 comments)
3. Revolt: Open-Source Alternative to Discord (316 points | 249 comments)
4. AMD Announces "Instella" Open-Source 3B Language Models (141 points | 39 comments)
5. Automatically tagging politician when they use their phone on the livestreams (196 points | 97 comments)
6. Cognitive Behaviors That Enable Self-Improving Reasoners (182 points | 52 comments)
7. QwQ-32B: Embracing the Power of Reinforcement Learning (375 points | 113 comments)
8. On the criteria to be used in decomposing systems into modules (1972) (24 points | 2 comments)
9. Apache iceberg the Hadoop of the modern-data-stack? (52 points | 21 comments)
10. Beavers Are Coming Home (22 points | 13 comments)
11. Windows Is Free for Business (2008) (21 points | 18 comments)
12. Empirical Health is hiring design engineers to build primary care of the future ( | hide)
13. Exploring the Paramilitary Leaks (182 points | 90 comments)
14. Zentool – AMD Zen Microcode Manipulation Utility (186 points | 45 comments)
15. GoStringUngarbler: Deobfuscating Strings in Garbled Binaries (6 points | 5 comments)
16. Scientists crack how aspirin might stop cancers from spreading (32 points | 14 comments)
17. Forget Twitter threads and write a blog post instead (2021) (140 points | 87 comments)
18. Apple M3 Ultra (988 points | 922 comments)
19. Yoke: Infrastructure as code, but actually (100 points | 93 comments)
20. Tiny Ten DSP-Based HF Transceiver (43 points | 8 comments)
21. Game Theory and Settling the Debts of the Deceased in Ancient Times (3 points | 1 comment)
22. HYTRADBOI 2025 Conference Postmortem (50 points | 3 comments)
23. Nebu: A Spreadsheet Editor for Varvara (101 points | 12 comments)
24. Things we've learned about building products (271 points | 87 comments)
25. Solving First Order Differential Equations with Julia (100 points | 29 comments)
26. UK homes install subsidised heat pumps at record level (15 points | discuss)
27. Apple takes UK to court over 'backdoor' order (552 points | 205 comments)
28. Show HN: Leaflet.pub – a web app for creating and sharing rich documents (136 points | 44 comments)
29. Math Academy pulled me out of the Valley of Despair (174 points | 127 comments)
30. Show HN: Beating Pokemon Red with RL and <10M Parameters (144 points | 61 comments)
